kv9.2:5.3: Amataṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ ganthaniyaṃ oghaniyaṃ yoganiyaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ upādāniyaṃ saṃkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:5.12: asaṃkilesiyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:6.3: Amataṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ rajaniyaṃ kamaniyaṃ madaniyaṃ bandhaniyaṃ mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:6.6: nanu amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:6.8: Hañci amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:7.6: nanu amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:7.8: Hañci amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:8.3: Amataṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ acakkhukaraṇaṃ paññānirodhiyaṃ vighātapakkhiyaṃ anibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:8.6: nanu amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ na acakkhukaraṇaṃ paññābuddhiyaṃ avighātapakkhiyaṃ nibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:8.8: Hañci amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:8.10: nibbānasaṃvattaniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:9.1: Rūpaṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, rūpaṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ ganthaniyaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:9.5: Amataṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, amataṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:10.1: Rūpaṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ rajaniyaṃ kamaniyaṃ madaniyaṃ bandhaniyaṃ mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:10.3: Amataṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, amataṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:11.1: Rūpaṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, rūpaṃ dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:11.3: Amataṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, amataṃ dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:12.1: Rūpaṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, rūpaṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:12.5: Amataṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, amataṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:13.1: Amataṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, amataṃ asaṃyojaniyaṃ aganthaniyaṃ anoghaniyaṃ ayoganiyaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ anupādāniyaṃ asaṃkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:13.3: Rūpaṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, rūpaṃ asaṃyojaniyaṃ aganthaniyaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:14.1: Amataṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:14.3: Rūpaṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:15.1: Amataṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:15.3: Rūpaṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, rūpaṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:16.1: Amataṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:16.5: Rūpaṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, rūpaṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ … pe …
kv9.2:17.5: “nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānāti, nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānitvā nibbānaṃ maññati, nibbānasmiṃ maññati, nibbānato maññati, nibbānaṃ meti maññati, nibbānaṃ abhinandatī”ti.
